meta.label: ESRI(r) - Enrich from statistical named area
meta.description: Enrich a named area like postcode with the ESRI's data collections

inputRoles.name: datacollections
inputRoles.label: Data collections
inputRoles.description: Dataset containing the descriptor of data collections, must be obtained using the 'Data Collections' recipe

params.name: column_object_id
params.label: Column object_id:
params.description: Select the column corresponding to an unique ID in your input dataset (mandatory)

params.name: country
params.label: Country column:
params.description: Country column from the input dataset. In order to retrieve the specific content related to each country.

params.name: country_mode
params.label: Country formatted as:
params.description: In order to put the specific country format (See Utils)

params.name: column_user_area
params.label: Area column:
params.description: Column representing the area to be qualified. Ex: my_postcode_column (mandatory)

params.name: layer_type
params.label: Layer:
params.description: Postcode by default. If you have only 1 country, you can input a specific layer_id.

params.name: i_know_the_layer_name
params.label: Specific Layer ID:
params.description: (ex: US.ZIP5) If your data are related to only 1 country. See: Layer_id column in Utils to find it.

params.name: key_collections
params.label: Enrich with key collections:
params.description: KFacts and KSpend, if available in the ESRI(r) content (See it in Utils)

params.name: add_derivative
params.label: Add derivative variables:
params.description: All the derivatived indicators from the variables (percentages, index...)

params.name: token_expiration
params.label: Token expiration:
params.description: Define the token expiration in minutes (mandatory)

params.name: batch_size_unit
params.label: batch size:
params.description: Number of simultaneous area sent to the API (When increasing this value you may check with the log that the whole batch sent is taken into account)

params.name: out_sr
params.label: Out EPSG (Wkid):
params.description: Set a specific EPSG value for geometry in output. The default value is 4326, which is the standard (mandatory)

params.name: store_enrichment_as_key_value
params.label: Store enrichment as key value:
params.description: Should be enabled if you have different countries to enrich, since it can generate a massive number of columns

params.name: activate_backup
params.label: Backup:
params.description: Save the whole enrichment into a .csv file into the DSS tmp DATA-DIR (see the job log for the path)

params.name: api_throttle
params.label: API call throttle:
params.description: Define the pause in seconds between each Batch (mandatory)

params.name: sample
params.label: Try on a sample per batch:
params.description: 0 means No Limit. This options uses the first N records per batch of your dataset. Try X first line to check the result. (mandatory)
